name: CuriousProductManager
0:
”Alexa, open Curious Product Manager”
”Alexa, ask Curious Product Manager for the latest update”
”Alexa, start Curious Product Manager”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: curious product manager
des: Listen to the latest blogs posts from your favorite blog. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Enjoy!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
